This is a SceneObject special effect text Key format example. [Recommended] format: $"SOMeshText{narrative floating text queue global ID}_{floating text sequence number within queue}_DLCLevel{level ID where floating text is located}"

This is the 2nd floating text in group 0000. The starting text Key for the next new independent queue should be "SOMeshText0001_001_{level ID where floating text is located}". The queue concept has no programmatic meaning, it's just intended for convenient reference.

This is the 3rd floating text in group 0000. When configuring special effect text, please pay attention to length and placement position to avoid clipping issues, and consider the text after localization
